author: Unity
description:
🗺️ Your NPCs are lost… let’s fix that.

Join Unity Insider, @LlamAcademy live with a step-by-step intro to Unity Navigation!Learn how to set up pathfinding, build smarter AI, and give your worlds seamless movement.✨ 

Beginner-friendly. All you need is the Unity Editor.▶️ 

Watch live: Tomorrow, 8/26 at 8am ET / 5am PT / 12pm GMT: https://on.unity.com/3HnFGYl 

#madewithunity #UnityInsider #gamedev
title: Unity Navigation Livestream
